0.text: What type of dialog do you want to see?

1.text: Okay, here you go. You have got only one option.

2.text: So here you are - you can only go forward or backwards.
2.moretext: Use the left and right arrow keys to navigate.

3.text: Cool! Now you can navigate in dialogs, which don't have responses.

4.moretext: But you can still go to the next option.

5.text: Here you can choose to which of all dialogs you want to go to.
